results.name: Numbers k such that the number of 1's in the binary expansion of k divides 2^k-1.
link: Amiram Eldar, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
mathematica: Select[Range[300], (d = DigitCount[#, 2, 1]) == 1 || PowerMod[2, #, d] == 1 &] (* _Amiram Eldar_, Jul 30 2020 *)
results.author: _Benoit Cloitre_, Sep 17 2002
ext: Edited by _N. J. A. Sloane_, May 10 2007
